solution.text:
The mixed fraction \({_{j}_}\frac {2}{15}\) can be converted to improper form by using this formula \(\frac{(15 \times _{j}_)+2}{15}\)
Therefore, \({_{j}_}\frac {2}{15}\) = _{{trunc(Decimal((15*j)+2)/Decimal(15), 2)}}_
